rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {3878}
(Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {SRH5003} or  Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {MPH5040, MPH5041})

description: This unit aims to facilitate the process of research in emergency health. Firstly, the unit will extend the knowledge and understanding of research methodology gained in the research methods unit; and additionally focus attention upon a range of practical, technical and management issues associated with the conduct of scientific research. The unit will facilitate student access to academics or clinicians offering projects, and who will support the student during all stages of the inquiry process.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
